content.html: Why is it impossible to find a backpack that: 1. Looks good 2. Has a padded laptop sleeve (can fit a 15" MacBook Pro) 3. Is durable I loved my Everlane one (it fit so much stuff), but a cat peed on it, and it was irredeemable. And they don't make it any more :( Recs?
content.value:
Why is it impossible to find a backpack that:
1. Looks good
2. Has a padded laptop sleeve (can fit a 15" MacBook Pro)
3. Is durable

I loved my Everlane one (it fit so much stuff), but a cat peed on it, and it was irredeemable. And they don't make it any more :(

Recs?
